main event: Multiple sightings of an object described as brighter than blue and showering off sparks, varying in constant speed and breaking up in a shower of sparks.
interesting points: The object was observed over Columbus, Ohio on July 7, 1960.
The sighting was reported to be multiple sightings of a meteor-like object.
The object was described as brighter than blue and showering off sparks.
The object varied in constant speed and broke up in a shower of sparks.
sighted object: a meteor-like object that was brighter than blue and showering off sparks
